verses.verse: And David <WH1732> spake <WH1696> unto Jehovah <WH3068> the words <WH1697> of this song <WH7892> in the day <WH3117> that Jehovah <WH3068> delivered <WH5337> him out of the hand <WH3709> of all his enemies <WH341>, and out of the hand <WH3709> of Saul <WH7586>:
and he said <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3068> is my rock <WH5553>, and my fortress <WH4686>, and my deliverer <WH6403>, even mine;

God <WH430>, my rock <WH6697>, in him will I take refuge <WH2620>; My shield <WH4043>, and the horn <WH7161> of my salvation <WH3468>, my high tower <WH4869>, and my refuge <WH4498>; My saviour <WH3467>, thou savest <WH3467> me from violence <WH2555>.
I will call <WH7121> upon Jehovah <WH3068>, who is worthy to be praised <WH1984>: So shall I be saved <WH3467> from mine enemies <WH341>.
For the waves <WH4867> of death <WH4194> compassed <WH661> me <WH5158>; The floods of ungodliness <WH1100> made me afraid <WH1204>:
The cords <WH2256> of Sheol <WH7585> were round about <WH5437> me <WH4170>; The snares of death <WH4194> came upon me <WH6923>.

In my distress <WH6862> I called <WH7121> upon Jehovah <WH3068>; Yea <WH7121>, I called unto my God <WH430>: And he heard <WH8085> my voice <WH6963> out of his temple <WH1964>, And my cry <WH7775> came into his ears <WH241>.
Then the earth <WH776> shook <WH1607> and trembled <WH7493>, The foundations <WH4146> of heaven <WH8064> quaked <WH7264> And were shaken <WH1607>, because he was wroth <WH2734>.
There went up <WH5927> a smoke <WH6227> out of his nostrils <WH639>, And fire <WH784> out of his mouth <WH6310> devoured <WH398>: Coals <WH1513> were kindled by it <WH1197>.
He bowed <WH5186> the heavens <WH8064> also <WH3381>, and came down; And thick darkness <WH6205> was under his feet <WH7272>.
And he rode <WH7392> upon a cherub <WH3742>, and did fly <WH5774>; Yea <WH7200>, he was seen upon the wings <WH3671> of the wind <WH7307>.
And he made <WH7896> darkness <WH2822> pavilions <WH5521> round about <WH5439> him <WH2841>, Gathering of waters <WH4325>, thick clouds <WH5645> of the skies <WH7834>.
At the brightness <WH5051> before him Coals <WH1513> of fire <WH784> were kindled <WH1197>.
Jehovah <WH3068> thundered <WH7481> from heaven <WH8064>, And the Most High <WH5945> uttered <WH5414> his voice <WH6963>.
And he sent out <WH7971> arrows <WH2671>, and scattered <WH6327> them <WH1300>; Lightning, and discomfited them <WH2000>.

Then the channels <WH650> of the sea <WH3220> appeared <WH7200>, The foundations <WH4146> of the world <WH8398> were laid bare <WH1540>, By the rebuke <WH1606> of Jehovah <WH3068>, At the blast <WH5397> of the breath <WH7307> of his nostrils <WH639>.
He sent <WH7971> from on high <WH4791>, he took <WH3947> me <WH4871>; He drew me out of many <WH7227> waters <WH4325>;
He delivered <WH5337> me from my strong <WH5794> enemy <WH341>, From them that hated <WH8130> me <WH553>; for they were too mighty for me.
They came upon <WH6923> me in the day <WH3117> of my calamity <WH343>; But Jehovah <WH3068> was my stay <WH4937>.
He brought me forth <WH3318> also into a large place <WH4800>; He delivered <WH2502> me <WH2654>, because he delighted in me.
Jehovah <WH3068> rewarded <WH1580> me according to my righteousness <WH6666>; According to the cleanness <WH1252> of my hands <WH3027> hath he recompensed me <WH7725>.
For I have kept <WH8104> the ways <WH1870> of Jehovah <WH3068>, And have not wickedly departed <WH7561> from my God <WH430>.
For all his ordinances <WH4941> were before me <WH2708>; And as for his statutes, I did not depart from them <WH5493>.
I was also perfect <WH8549> toward him <WH8104>; And I kept myself from mine iniquity <WH5771>.
Therefore hath Jehovah <WH3068> recompensed <WH7725> me according to my righteousness <WH6666>, According to my cleanness <WH1252> in his eyesight <WH5048>.
With the merciful <WH2623> thou wilt show thyself merciful <WH2616>; With the perfect <WH8549> man <WH1368> thou wilt show thyself perfect <WH8549>;
With the pure <WH1305> thou wilt show thyself pure <WH1305>; And with the perverse <WH6141> thou wilt show thyself froward <WH6141>.
And the afflicted <WH6041> people <WH5971> thou wilt save <WH3467>; But thine eyes <WH5869> are upon the haughty <WH7311>, that thou mayest bring them down <WH8213>.
For thou art my lamp <WH5216>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; And Jehovah <WH3068> will lighten <WH5050> my darkness <WH2822>.
For by thee I run <WH7323> upon a troop <WH1416>; By my God <WH430> do I leap over <WH1801> a wall <WH7791>.
As for God <WH410>, his way <WH1870> is perfect <WH8549>: The word <WH565> of Jehovah <WH3068> is tried <WH6884>; He is a shield <WH4043> unto all them that take refuge in him <WH2620>.
For who is God <WH410>, save <WH1107> Jehovah <WH3068>? And who is a rock <WH6697>, save <WH1107> our God <WH430>?
God <WH410> is my strong <WH4581> fortress <WH2428>; And he guideth <WH5425> the perfect <WH8549> in his way <WH1870>.
He maketh <WH7737> his feet <WH7272> like <WH7737> hinds <WH355>' feet <WH5975>, And setteth me upon my high places <WH1116>.
He teacheth <WH3925> my hands <WH3027> to war <WH4421>, So that mine arms <WH2220> do bend <WH5181> a bow <WH7198> of brass <WH5154>.
Thou hast also given <WH5414> me the shield <WH4043> of thy salvation <WH3468>; And thy gentleness <WH6031> hath made me great <WH7235>.
Thou hast enlarged <WH7337> my steps <WH6806> under me <WH7166>; And my feet have not slipped <WH4571>.
I have pursued <WH7291> mine enemies <WH341>, and destroyed <WH8045> them <WH7725>; Neither did I turn again till they were consumed <WH3615>.
And I have consumed <WH3615> them <WH4272>, and smitten them through <WH6965>, so that they cannot arise: Yea <WH5307>, they are fallen under my feet <WH7272>.
For thou hast girded <WH247> me with strength <WH2428> unto the battle <WH4421>; Thou hast subdued <WH3766> under me those that rose up against me <WH6965>.
Thou hast also made <WH5414> mine enemies <WH341> turn their backs <WH6203> unto me <WH6789>, That I might cut off them that hate me <WH8130>.
They looked <WH8159>, but there was none to save <WH3467>; Even unto Jehovah <WH3068>, but he answered them not <WH6030>.
Then did I beat <WH7833> them small as the dust <WH6083> of the earth <WH776>, I did crush <WH1854> them as the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351>, and did spread them abroad <WH7554>.

Thou also hast delivered <WH6403> me from the strivings <WH7379> of my people <WH5971>; Thou hast kept <WH8104> me to be the head <WH7218> of the nations <WH1471>: A people <WH5971> whom I have not known <WH3045> shall serve me <WH5647>.
The foreigners <WH1121> shall submit <WH3584> themselves unto me <WH8085>: As soon as they hear of me <WH8085>, they shall obey me.
The foreigners <WH1121> shall fade away <WH5034>, And shall come trembling <WH2296> out of their close places <WH4526>.
Jehovah <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>; And blessed <WH1288> be my rock <WH6697>; And exalted <WH7311> be God <WH430>, the rock <WH6697> of my salvation <WH3468>,
Even the God <WH410> that executeth vengeance <WH5414> for me <WH3381>, And that bringeth down peoples under me <WH5971>,

And that bringeth me forth <WH3318> from mine enemies <WH341>: Yea <WH7311>, thou liftest me up above them that rise up <WH6965> against me <WH5337>; Thou deliverest me from the violent <WH2555> man <WH376>.
Therefore I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, among the nations <WH1471>, And will sing praises <WH2167> unto thy name <WH8034>.

Great <WH4024> deliverance <WH3444> giveth he to his king <WH4428>, And showeth <WH6213> lovingkindness <WH2617> to his anointed <WH4899>, To David <WH1732> and to his seed <WH2233>, for <WH5704> evermore <WH5769>.
